title: New Issue Out Now Quasars Anxiety Underwater Killers Quantum Computers And The Doomsday Glacier

Quasars, anxiety, underwater killers, quantum computers and the Doomsday Glacier…** Posted byJez Fordon December 31, 2020 inMagazine·0 Comments Issue #80 of Australian Science Illustrated publishes today! Learn about the cosmic storms generated by quasars, the world-changing ways of quantum computers, the promising future of wave energy, the frightening hunting methods of underwater creatures, the danger posed by the Thwaites Glacier in Antarctica, how we may one day be able to vaccinate against anxiety, and much more. It’s available now in all good newsagents and on digital platforms includingZinio,ReadlyandRBdigital.
